about_the_game:
When you’re done finding success in the eco green cityscapes, there are more worlds to explore in THE GAME OF LIFE 2!

Watch the difficult decisions melt away in the new Sandy Shores world! Experience a land of forever sunshine, where the blue skies and golden coastline never ends.

Ride the waves as a Surf Instructor, or dive beneath them as a Marine Biologist. Enjoy the resorts solo, or meet your one true love and have a beach wedding. Commit to the lifestyle and invest in a beach house or a boat! It’s a life-long escape and the choices are all yours!

Join your friends and family and explore life on a forever holiday!
detailed_description:
Special Offer



Your FREE Crab Outfit is Waiting!

We asked for your outfit suggestions for the NEW Sandy Shores world, and your creativity blew us away! After a week-long vote, the Crab outfit came out on top, and it’s now FREE in-game for everyone!

It’s a unique look that’s bound to make you stand out from the crowd! Let the difficult decisions slide right off your hardened shell and click those pincers with a rhythm of your own! You’ll blend right in with the local wildlife in this adorable onesie!

Get ready to bask on the endless sun-drenched sandy beaches of the brand new THE GAME OF LIFE 2 Sandy Shores world! Wear it on your forever holiday today!
